xml.title: Revenue By Date
xml.description: This report shows the gross revenue by date for a selected game and or client for a specified date range. In addition, this report also shows the Rev/DAU or DARPU for the same selected game and date range.
xml.query:
:qcreate temporary table tmp.revenue(index(stat_date, currency_code)) engine=myisam as select start_date as stat_date, currency_of_proceeds as currency_code, sum(units*net_revenue)/0.7 as gross_revenue from star.itunes_sales where start_date between date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval $days$+7 day) and date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) group by 1,2 ;
select stat_date as Date, sum(value) as DAU from star.s_game_day where case when '$gameid$'='-2' then game_id else $gameid$ end = game_id and case when '$clientid$'='-2' then client_id else $clientid$ end = client_id and stat_date between '$startdate$' and '$enddate$' and metric='ActiveUsersByDay' group by 1 order by 1
xml.parm: select distinct game_id, game_name from lookups.l_flurry_game union select -2, 'All Games' order by 2
